participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and empathetic, Emily enjoys exploring new ideas and experiences.
participant_1.background: I'm a big fan of horror movies, but I know my parents wouldn't approve. I flirted with the dmv officer in order to pass my driving exam. I love to go on hikes with my friends and enjoy the fresh air and beautiful scenery. I am allergic to a lot of things, but I love grilling meat for my family. I am looking for a home that is close to my parents so that I can easily help them out as they get older.

participant_2.name: Oliver
participant_2.personality: Compassionate and introspective, Oliver dedicates his life to helping others, especially animals.
participant_2.background: I am single because my time is devoted to rescuing animals. My cape is in storage and I am trying to adjust to Swedish life. My favorite author is Jane Austen. I love my parents very much. I am a couch potato.

content.text: I'm a big fan of Jane Austen, but I know my parents wouldn't approve.
My favorite author is Jane Austen too! How did you get into her books?
I love the way she writes. She's so witty and clever. I'm especially a fan of her heroines.
Yes, I love her heroines too! They're so strong and independent.
I'm also a big fan of her romances. They're so romantic and heartwarming.
Yes, her romances are the best! I love how she writes about love and relationships.
I'm glad to see someone else who loves Jane Austen! She's the best!
Yes, she is! I'm so glad I met you.
Me too! I'm sure we'll be good friends.
